body.description: Revive and rejuvenate dry, dull skin with SheaMoisture Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion — a deeply hydrating semi-thick body lotion made with all natural and certified organic ingredients. SheaMoisture Raw Shea Butter Hydrating body lotion is a dry skin moisturizer that deeply hydrates and rejuvenates dull skin. Blended with fair trade shea butter and coconut oil, this body lotion leaves skin feeling smooth and revived. This body lotion, formulated without parabens by SheaMoisture, combines fair trade shea butter and nourishing oils. Can be used as a hand or body lotion. SheaMoisture Raw Shea Butter Lotion, blended with Frankincense and Myrrh, helps restore dry skin. Formulated without parabens. Use this moisturizing raw shea butter lotion all over. Concentrate on rough and dry areas or use as a hand cream and foot cream. For best results, apply this lotion to damp skin. Raw Shea Butter moisturizing lotion is formulated without no parabens, no phthalates and no mineral oil. SheaMoisture Story; SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revive and rejuvenate dry, dull skin with SheaMoisture SheaMoisture Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion — a deeply hydrating semi-thick body lotion made with all natural and certified organic ingredients.

Feel Smooth And Revived A deeply hydrating semi-thick body lotion that revives and rejuvenates dry, dull skin. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True & Cruelty-Free Tested on friends and family for generations—never on animals. Because of Her SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

Raw Shea Butter Hydrating Body Wash Raw Shea Butter Hydrating Mud Mask Raw Shea Butter Facial Wash & Scrub Calms and revitalizes dull-looking dry skin while leaving skin soft, silky and beautifully hydrated. A non-drying mud mask that purifies skin as it hydrates. A buttery scrub that’s ideal for normal, combination, sensitive skin, and skin that’s prone to blemishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and safe ingredients according to Yuka app
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this lotion because it’s scored well on the Yuka app…93/100. It works well. My skin doesn’t feel greasy, and lotion absorbs quickly. Lotion does have a scent, but it doesn’t bother me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all body moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I live in a dry climate and this lotion is great. The scent is apparent but not overwhelming. Very light. The lotion doesn't have any 'wax' in it (also known as humectants) so it glides on the skin (mine anyway) nicely. I am prone to having sensitivities and this lotion (actually any of their scents) has never bothered me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery smooth, great value
reviews.reviewText: Everything I look for in a lotion. First of all no ingredients I don't want. Second it is very long lasting and hydrating. The smell is also very pleasant. This will be my go-to lotion from now on out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and locks in moisture!
reviews.reviewText: This smells so good! I have found that my skin stays the most hydrated when I keep this lotion by the sink and use right after washing my hands so that it really locks in the moisture. I love this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing but strong scent
reviews.reviewText: Four stars for lotion quality. However, I really want to like this lotion but the scent is very overpowering to me. I just got it today, put a tiny dab on the back of my hand, and it’s all I can smell. Even an hour later. :/ I will probably return/exchange for coconut one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lotion and Smells Wonderful
reviews.reviewText: I have tried this company’s body wash at the suggestion of a friend and love it so I picked up the lotion. Great smell, it’s thick but absorbs relatively quickly and lasts a long time. I love it so much I ordered an extra bottle. That should tell you all you need to know. Also, I have sensitive skin and haven’t had any issues with breakouts or rashes while using this. Try it, you will love it. I do wish it was a pump though as the bottle is a pain to squeeze sometimes, due to how thick it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and silky smooth texture!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very nice product! Hydrates your skin with no residue. I’m sensitive with products so I’m happy this is another I could use without breaking out with a nice scent! 👌🏼 EXCUSE MY SON WATCHING CURIOUS GEORGE IN THE BACKGROUND LOL..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my go-to "perfume". The scent is light and fresh and the lotion is beautifully moisturizing.
